key_points: Chris Cuomo and Don Lemon, CNN primetime anchors, are to co-host a new podcast titled The Handoff.
The Handoff will be a weekly podcast and available with a subscription to the CNN channel on Apple Podcasts.
The podcast is based on their spontaneous 'handoff' conversations between Cuomo's and Lemon's respective shows.
Don Lemon states the podcast will feature unscripted, honest conversations and is for those not easily offended.
Their on-air banter, including a discussion about Rick Santorum's offensive remarks, has previously made news.
Cuomo and Lemon's discussions often include real thoughts, questions, and disagreements glossed over in media.
The Handoff is part of a new wave of podcasts launched by CNN, aiming to expand its digital revenue streams.
Other new CNN podcasts include Behind the Desk: The Story of Late Night and a podcast by Dr. Sanjay Gupta.
Cuomo and Lemon aim to offer content that toughens up the audience through straightforward dialogue.
Cuomo notes the curiosity about their discussions as a prime reason for the podcast, highlighting its authenticity.
